full_summary:
## Service Request for De Classification
### Tender Information
#### Tender Reference
* Number: cb-787-77082402
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: 20240216

#### Tender Status
* Status Description: Expired
* Status Date: 2024-05-28

#### Solicitation Information
* Publication Date: 2024-05-09
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-05-28T14:00:00

#### Project Overview
The National Security and Intelligence Review Agency (NSIRA) is seeking a Senior Information/Records Management Specialist to provide support with the de classification process for their review library. The specialists will collaborate with the agency to review and analyze records to ensure de classification is carried out in a secure and efficient manner.

#### Key Components
* Duration of Contract: 30 months (June 10, 2024 – March 31, 2026)
* Expected Date of Contract Commencement: June 10, 2024
* Available Trade Agreements: Various (see detailed trade agreements section)
* Contract Categories: Service-Based
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Tender Method: Competitive Selective Tendering

#### Contract Details
* UNSPSC Code: 80101511 (Human Resources Consulting Services)
* Contract Categories: SRV (Service-Based)
* Notice Type: Demande de Propositions (RFP) - English and French
* Tender Method: Concurrentielle - Appel D'Offres Sélectif (Competitive Selective Tendering)

#### Contact Information
John Headon, Procurement Officer
Email: [john.headon@nsira-ossnr.gc.ca](mailto:john.headon@nsira-ossnr.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 597-6323

#### Attachment
20240216_Declassification-Services_NPP.pdf (WebAccess link)
(For detailed information, please refer to the attached document)

#### Notice Details
This entry is a summary of information related to the service procurement. For any other questions or inquiry, please contact John Headon. 

The advised text was the government report and documents review being published and shared through the Canadian government platform documenting various available tender and procurement opportunities. It's high-value-low-profile service supplier providing support for the de-classification of materials which are high risk classified and currently managed by NSIRA's reviewer library. You were provided to provide a professional recommendation around tender resource
